activities: Personal information may be gathered from our web-based software systems. This information includes names and addresses voluntarily entered by users of the system or provisioned via an SSO integration with our client. This information is used to authenticate users to our software. Guest users are allowed access to public page only and no personal information is gathered on the guest user.
